name: OpenMageModuleFostering/PutlerConnector
description:
Track Magento orders on desktop and mobile with Putler - Insightful reporting that grows your business.

Magento Putler Connector sends transactions to Putler using Putler's Inbound API. All past orders are sent when you first configure this extension. Future orders will be sent to Putler automatically.

You need a Putler account (Free or Paid), and a Magento based store to use this extension.
